TextView.android:text: Gokula Kannan blood bank was influenced by friends charitable trust. 2008 it was invented by kombaiah. Initially they started with 27 members. Blood bank is functioning in all the cities in Tamil Nadu, Mumbai and Kerala. They communicate with the help of social networking like whatsapp and phone calls. They are also providing awareness on eye donor and Nilavembu Kudineer is widely used in medicine to cure and prevent and manage of all types of viral infections and fever. They also helped during chennai floods and cyclone.
